Nozzle

Contains logic for interacting with the machine Nozzle

Functions
Remove
call Nozzle.Remove();

Instruct the machine to remove the nozzle

See Also

  • Nozzle.DropOff

DropOff
call Nozzle.DropOff();

Instruct the machine to remove the nozzle

See Also

  • Nozzle.Remove

Pickup
call Nozzle.Pickup();

Instruct the machine to pick up the nozzle

IsClamped
call Nozzle.isClamped(
&isClamped
);

Query the nozzle clamp status

Response Parameters
&isClamped

the current clamp status
